resources.string: ( Please, type Optic Number of the device you have. Optic Number is written on the device, usually starting from DVA or FAB etc. Please put all the letters and numbers. Optic number is very important information, so it must be correctly typed, otherwise you may experience wrong analysis or face difficulty on device activation. \n Example: DVAA1234 / FAB12345
(You can find out the SSID or Serial Number on the label of the device.)

(Please, type Email address or phone number. Please, put phone number after selecting the country code. The Email/Phone number will be used as user ID for the future program, and we will provide important information including license keys, and announcement contents.)
(Please write brand name if you are working with specific brand. If you are not working with brand, please, leave it empty.)
Application error occurred. A report will be sent to the developers.
Please turn on internet to upload image.
Press SEND to send the image(s).\n(It may takes a few minutes.).\nTotal Images found:
BM ID and Confirm BM ID must match!
Entering email address or phone number is required.
The backup file does not exist.
